short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin Love Screen Capture is an extension for screen share.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin is an app that allows you to connect with your friends and people all around the globe with freedom of self expression that will surely brings out the best in you.

"Plugin Love Screen Capture" is an extension for screen share.
